documentType: pre-trial preparation memo or meeting summary
summary: This document summarizes a December 7, 2021 meeting with a witness being prepared for trial testimony. The witness informed AUSAs that pro bono counsel was involved, and that someone from NYPD contacted her around the time of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and death. The witness was instructed not to speak to other witnesses, including her mother, about the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to by initials 'JE'; his arrest and death are mentioned as temporal reference points for when NYPD contacted the witness.

events.title: Witness preparation meeting
events.description: A meeting was held to prepare a witness for trial testimony. The witness discussed prior contact from NYPD and was given instructions regarding communication about the case.

events.title: NYPD contact with witness
events.description: Someone from the NYPD reached out to the witness in the summer of 2019 around the time of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and prior to his death.

keyFacts: A witness was being prepared for trial testimony in December 2021.
The witness reported being contacted by someone from the NYPD in the summer of 2019 around the time of Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and prior to his death.
The witness was instructed not to speak to other witnesses, including her mother, about the case until the trial was complete.
The document indicates the witness had pro bono counsel.
